path = re.search(r'mkdir: cannot create directory '(.+)':', command.stderr).group(1)
    return re.sub(r'\s+\S+$', ' ' + os.path.dirname(path), command.script)

path = re.search('(?<=cannot create directory ).*(?= : No such file)',
                     command.stderr).group(0)
    new_path = '/'.join(path.split('/')[:-1])

    return u'mkdir -p "{}" && {}'.format(new_path, command.script)
return u'mkdir -p {}'.format(re.split(r'\smkdir', command.script)[-1])

pattern = re.compile(r'^mkdir: cannot create directory (?P<dir>(\'.*\')|(".*")) : .*$')
    match = pattern.search(command.stderr)
    dir_name = match.group('dir')
    parent_dir = os.path.dirname(dir_name)

    return command.script.replace(dir_name, parent_dir)

bad_path = re.sub(r".*: (.*)", r"\1", command.stderr)
    return re.sub(bad_path, "", command.script)

folders = re.findall(r'mkdir: (.*)', command.stderr)
    return u'mkdir -p {}'.format(' '.join(folders))

# Replace 'mkdir my/path/foo' with 'mkdir -p my/path/foo'.
    return re.sub(r'^mkdir (?=\S)', 'mkdir -p', command.script)
